Summary: UFO appears in photo taken of "Old Faithful" at Yellowstone
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend Norman went to Yellowstone in July. He recently uploaded the images from the trip. In one of the images was this UFO. He didn't notice it at the time or even later when he posted the pictures until I pointed it out. No ideas to the size or heading of this object. It does not appear in the photos taken before or after this one.
